text: The 1922–23 Harrison S.C. season was the second season for the club in the American Soccer League. The club finished the season in 7th place. In the off- season, the club moved and became Newark F.C. ==American Soccer League== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !Date !Opponents !H/A !Result F–A !Scorers !Attendance |- bgcolor="#ffdddd" |8 October 1922 |Paterson F.C. |H |1-3 |McCartin | |- bgcolor="#ffdddd" |14 October 1922 |Philadelphia F.C. |H |1-3 |Brown | |- bgcolor="#ffdddd" |15 October 1922 |Philadelphia F.C. |A |3-4 |Fletcher, Hartnett, Brown | |- bgcolor="#ffdddd" |29 October 1922 |Fall River F.C. |H |1-2 |J.
